Demos Box2D

  • First demo: Making sure everything is working.

  • Walkers: Simple collision model.

  • SolSens: First Demo with the floor.

  • Kinematic: Kinetic object moving among obstacle with discrete data.

  • Kinematic+SolSens: Fusion between demo4 and demo5.

Demos Threejs walker

  • Character Controller: Control a character with keyboards events.

  • One walker: Playing with the character's walking animation.

  • Many walkers:

    Adding many walkers to the scene.

Demos combinadas

  • Physic+many walkers: Combination between the Box2D and the ThreeJS demos.

  • Physic+many walkers+SolSens:

  • Final demo: Encapsulate the bots in a package. Ready to install to the main game.
